case.title: Lunch tomorrow? - 34 (London)
case.text:
Hello, I have the day off tomorrow and was wondering if any nice kind gentleman might be available for lunch with a slim, attractive and intelligent brunette?
I'm a very down to earth and genuine person. If we don't hit it off romantically at least we can hopefully have a decent conversation!
Please be tall, good looking and professional, and send a photo if possible with a few lines about yourself.
Thanks and have a lovely day! Xx
